solution_line_template: In the first bag the proportion that pops is {proportion_bag1} because {kernels_popped_bag1} / {total_kernels_bag1} = <<{kernels_popped_bag1}/{total_kernels_bag1}={proportion_bag1}>>{proportion_bag1}

In the second bag the proportion that pops is {proportion_bag2} because {kernels_popped_bag2} / {total_kernels_bag2} = <<{kernels_popped_bag2}/{total_kernels_bag2}={proportion_bag2}>>{proportion_bag2}
In the third bag the proportion that pops is {proportion_bag3} because {kernels_popped_bag3} / {total_kernels_bag3} = <<{kernels_popped_bag3}/{total_kernels_bag3}={proportion_bag3}>>{proportion_bag3}
The average percentage is {average_percentage} because {average_proportion} x {percent_multiplier} = <<{average_proportion}*{percent_multiplier}={average_percentage}>>{average_percentage}
